verses.html:
1
I belong to Jesus;
I am not my own;
All I have and all I am,
Shall be His alone.

2
I belong to Jesus;
He is Lord and King,
Reigning in my inmost heart,
Over ev’rything.

3
I belong to Jesus; What can hurt or harm,
When He folds around my soul His almighty arm?

4
I belong to Jesus;
Blessed, blessed thought!
With His own most precious blood
Has my soul been bought.

5
I belong to Jesus;
He has died for me;
I am His and He is mine,
Through eternity.

6
I belong to Jesus;
He will keep my soul,
When the deathly waters dark
Round about me roll.

7
I belong to Jesus;
And ere long I’ll stand
With my precious Saviour there
In the glory land.
